{"id":855533666,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1670326259,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"47 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/855533666/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int max_area(vector<vector<int>>& grid,int i, int j, int m, int n,int& cnt){\n        if(i<0 or j<0 or i>=m or j>=n or !grid[i][j]){\n            return 0;\n        }\n        grid[i][j]=0;\n        if(max_area(grid,i+1,j,m,n,cnt)) cnt++;;  //down\n        if(max_area(grid,i-1,j,m,n,cnt))cnt++; //up\n        if(max_area(grid,i,j+1,m,n,cnt))cnt++;  //right\n        if(max_area(grid,i,j-1,m,n,cnt))cnt++;  // left\n\n        return 1;\n    }\n\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int ans=0;\n        int m=grid.size();\n        int n=grid[0].size();\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for (int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                int cnt=1;\n                if(grid[i][j]){\n                    max_area(grid,i,j,m,n,cnt);\n                    ans=max(ans,cnt);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false}
